title: Docker-compose build script hangs

labels.name: P-unconfirmed
labels.description: Issue might be valid, but itâ€™s not yet confirmed

body:
**Describe the bug**
I'm trying to run the OVM client according to the [official tutorial](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism-tutorial).

One of the steps is running `docker-compose build` from `./ops`. It works until `Building integration_tests`, where after `Step 3/15 : RUN apk add --no-cache git curl python bash jq` it prints regular `apk` success message `OK: 66 MiB in 34 packages` and then hangs. No error, no CPU grinding, no network load, just hangs.

**To Reproduce**
Just go with the tutorial:
1. `git clone https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism.git`
1. `cd optimism`
1. `yarn install`
1. `yarn build`
1. `cd ops`
1. `docker-compose build`

**Expected behavior**
`docker-compose build` doesn't hang

**Screenshots**

<details>
  <summary>The full `docker-compose build` log</summary>

